word: CONCERNING HER OWN PERSONAL RELATIONSHIP TO THIS MATTER, SHE WROTE IN 1874 THAT SHE "NEVER HAD A VISION THAT NO MORE SINNERS WOULD BE CONVERTED." NOR DID SHE EVER TEACH THIS VIEW. "IT WAS THE LIGHT GIVEN ME OF GOD," SHE WROTE AT ANOTHER TIME, "THAT CORRECTED OUR ERROR, AND ENABLED US TO SEE THE TRUE POSITION." (SELECTED MESSAGES, BOOK 1, PP. 74, 63.)
